attributes.action: Extend driving theory test during pandemic
attributes.additional_details: To extend the period of length for the pass of the theory test for ALL who have lessons booked and had them delayed.
attributes.background: During the pandemic, many people have done many lessons and had there tests cancelled. Having a theory test only valid for two years whilst inflicting rules which prevent the individual doing the test, is unfair and then becomes a class issue whereas who can afford more lessons and can rebook.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160
